mapper.select: select a.idx as idx, a.title as title, a.content as content, a.userid as userid, a.regdate as regdate, a.type as type from t_myMap a inner join t_hashtag b on a.idx = b.mymapidx inner join t_regmap c on a.idx = c.mymapidx where (a.title like CONCAT('%',#{searchtext},'%') or a.content like CONCAT('%',#{searchtext},'%') or b.name = CONCAT('%',#{searchtext},'%')) and c.blind=0 and a.type=1 group by a.idx order by a.regdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
